examples: an unexplained occurrence that baffled everyone

verb.description: Restrain or regulate (a fluid, sound, etc.)
examples: to baffle the noise further, I pad the gunwales

noun.description: A device used to restrain the flow of a fluid, gas, or loose material or to prevent the spreading of sound or light in a particular direction.

origin: Late 16th century (in the sense cheat, deceive): perhaps related to French bafouer ridicule or obsolete French beffer mock, deceive.
